targets.expr: ohm_gpunvidia_bytes{instance="$instance",sensor="GPU Memory Used"} * 100 / ignoring(sensor) ohm_gpunvidia_bytes{instance="$instance",sensor="GPU Memory Total"} or ohm_gpuati_bytes{instance="$instance",sensor="GPU Memory Used"} * 100 / ignoring(sensor) ohm_gpuati_bytes{instance="$instance",sensor="GPU Memory Total"}
ohm_cpu_watts{instance="$instance", sensor=~".*Package"} + ignoring(sensor, hw_instance, hardware) (ohm_gpunvidia_watts{instance="$instance"} or ohm_gpuati_watts{instance="$instance"})
